channel.title: Everytime I try to log in on my char its black screen logsoff andsaysim still on
channel.description:
[glow=red,2,300][/glow]YO people please dont post gay ass remarks that say you stupid noob or im a dumbass Im new at this and you people sure as hell don't make it easy(enough)for me atleast! OK here is the problem i downloaded the server laxiscape13 igot the compile.bat to work thanks to Mod Thoraks perfect compiler for noobs :) but when i log in it goes to a black screen and automaticly logs me off. When i go back to log in again it says that im already logged in and wont let me get on even when i have admin control!!!! please help me out and if you need a video to help find problem just say so ill post it on youtube and send you the link Thanks again and please keep listening to DC101 ;D[/glow][/font][br][size=1]Posted at: December 14, 2006, 07:43:10 PM[/size][hr]up this what it say in compiler thing laxiscape comes with
ClientHandler: Accepted from 127.0.0.1:3039 tes is signing into server. tes: character file not found. tes: moreinfo file not found. ClientHandler: Accepted from 127.0.0.1:3053 Exception in thread "Thread-0" java.lang.OutOfMemoryError: Java heap space

Im new at this and you people sure as hell don’t make it easy(enough)for me atleast!
OK here is the problem

perfect compiler for noobs but when i log in it goes to a black screen and automaticly
logs me off. When i go back to log in again it says that im already logged in and wont let me
get on even when i have admin control!!!
please help me out and if you need a video to help find problem just say so ill post it on youtube and send you the link
Thanks again
